# spatialist

[![Travis Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/kamapu/spatialist.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/kamapu/spatialist)

A package for customized spatial (GIS) functions in **R**.
To install it, use the package `devtools`.

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github("kamapu/spatialist")
```
